package.name: mower_msgs
package.description:
Message and service definitions for OpenMower.
Contains message types for: - Docking sensor status - Emergency states - ESC (motor controller) status - High-level mower status - IMU raw data - Perimeter wire signals - Power system status - Low-level mower status
And services for: - Emergency stop control - GPS enable/disable - High-level mower control - Mower motor control - Perimeter sensing control
Ported from open_mower_ros (ROS1) to ROS2.
package.author: Clemens Elflein
